name: Bcli
tagline: Graphical interface to set up a command line to render Blender files with Blender...
body:
According to the datas you provide (Blender executable (path or name if in your O.S. path (in this case it's just "blender")), path to the Blender file you want to render, path and name of the output, etc), it will generate the command that you can copy and paste in your terminal or let Bcli making it executed by Blender (python subprocess).

![Bcli frontend](http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1382292145.png)

![Bcli command line for blender](http://pix.toile-libre.org/upload/original/1382292389.png)
